USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.usp_gold_trip_data
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN 

-----Creating a SQL
    DECLARE @create_sql  NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql   NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_sql = 
    'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month + 
	' WITH 
	(
		DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
		LOCATION = ''gold/trip_data_green/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''',
		FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
	)
    AS
        SELECT td.year, 
                td.month,
                tz.borough, 
                cal.day_name AS trip_day,
                CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date,
                CASE WHEN cal.day_name IN (''Saturday'', ''Sunday'') THEN ''Y'' ELSE ''N'' END AS weekend_trip,
                SUM(CASE WHEN pt.payment_type_desc = ''Credit card'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_trips_count,
                SUM(CASE WHEN pt.payment_type_desc = ''Cash'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_trips_count
        FROM bronze.vw_trip_data as td
        JOIN  silver.CETAS_taxi_zone tz ON (td.PULocationID = tz.location_id)
        JOIN silver.CETAS_calendar cal ON (cal.date = CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
        JOIN silver.CETAS_payment_type pt ON (td.payment_type = pt.payment_type)
        WHERE td.year = ''' + @year + '''
        AND td.month = ''' + @month + '''
        GROUP BY 
            td.year, 
            td.month,
            tz.borough, 
            cal.day_name,
            CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime)
       
    '
    print(@create_sql)

    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql;

    SET @drop_sql = 
    ' DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month;

    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql;

END
